properties.name: pque.delay
properties.description: Default time before the messages become visible (in seconds) in PGMQ.

properties.name: pque.visibilityTimeout
properties.description: Default time for which a message remains invisible after being read (in seconds) in PGMQ.

properties.name: pque.checkMessage
properties.description: Check if a message is valid JSON before sending it in PGMQ.
